name: Self-Authorization Practices
description: Eliminating dependence on external validation and cultivating absolute internal authority over decision-making and self-worth.

cards.title: Breaking Free from External Validation
cards.description: Training the mind to disconnect from seeking approval or recognition from external sources.
cards.bulletpoints: Recognizing Validation Loops, Developing Internal Affirmation Systems, Conscious Approval Detox

cards.title: The Power of Self-Permission
cards.description: Learning how to internally validate choices and decisions without external reinforcement.
cards.bulletpoints: Establishing Inner Authority, Decision Ownership Techniques, Self-Permission Rituals

cards.title: Refusing to Seek Justification
cards.description: Eliminating the need to explain, justify, or rationalize personal choices to others.
cards.bulletpoints: Boundary Enforcement Speech, Assertive Decision-Making, Psychological Disengagement from Justification
